# [`class()`]{.blue}
 
 
### [class]{.blue}(_thingy_){.center} 
 
# What it does 

If you are not sure what something is, you can check its class by typing using the [`class()`]{.blue} function in the console windowpane. 
  
 
# Demo code 

```{r eval=FALSE}
class(iris)
```
